data.actual_result: You get scrolled up in the chat and for some reason pressing the ESC key refuses to scroll you back down to the bottom of chat unless you switch to another channel and back
data.expected_result: Your current scrolled position is kept in place
data.short_description: Changing your Chat Font Scaling to a higher setting while in a channel causes your client to scroll up in chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel with enough messages to scroll up in - Be on a Chat Font Scaling below <150 - Go into your User Settings -> Appearance and change your Chat Font Scaling to one greater than your currently set one - Close your User Settings and observe your currently scrolled position in chat
